body.p:
Lexington Mar 13th 1861
To His Excellency Governor Magoffin-

This note will be handed to you by Mr Samuel L Lewis together with a petition. I recommend in the warmest manner the object of that petition. Mr Lewis is a son of Higgins Lewis Esqr- one of the most respectable & wealthy farmers of our county.

With great respect I am
Yours &c
Wm C P Breckinridge
